text:
Apple TV + can be used for free for a year, but there are limitations
01 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Ilya Sidorov
Today Apple TV + has earned in Russia. Some users may subscribe for a one-year free subscription. However, the service has certain conditions that you need to know before subscribing.
How to use Apple TV + for free throughout the year
If you purchase any iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Apple TV and Mac after September 10, 2019, you will receive a free annual subscription to Apple TV +. The device should work on the latest version of iOS, iPadOS, tvOS or macOS.
When you open Apple TV + for the first time, a blue button will appear asking you to activate a subscription for one year.



When is the offer really
A trial subscription can be connected within three months from the date of purchase of the device.
If the gadget was purchased from September 10 to November 1, then three months are counted from November 1.
Can I unsubscribe
Yes, but you‚Äôll lose access to Apple TV + and all TV shows. In case of cancellation of the subscription, the rest of the trial period burns out without the possibility of reconnecting.
Therefore, do not cancel your subscription immediately after connecting. Better put a reminder at the end of October 2020, so as not to forget to turn it off.
Free subscription is issued once
The trial period can be activated from only one device, regardless of the number of devices purchased.
Family access
A subscription can be shared with up to five family members. For this, Family Access must be configured.
If you have an Apple Music Student Membership
Apple TV + is included with Apple Music student membership. In this case, the annual period is not connected. [Apple]
